EcsInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

KeyName.Description: Optional - Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the ECS instances

AsgMaxSize.Description: Maximum size and initial Desired Capacity of ECS Auto Scaling Group

AsgMinSize.Description: Minimum size of ECS Auto Scaling Group

EcsPort.Description: Optional - Security Group port to open on ECS instances - defaults to port 80

ElbPort.Description: Optional - Security Group port to open on ELB - port 80 will be open by default

ElbProtocol.Description: Optional - ELB Protocol - defaults to HTTP

ElbHealthCheckTarget.Description: Optional - Health Check Target for ELB - defaults to HTTP:80/

SourceCidr.Description: Optional - CIDR/IP range for EcsPort and ElbPort - defaults to 0.0.0.0/0

serviceDesiredCount.Description: Desired number of services to have

ECS Scale Down Service App Service Topic

Scales Down the Service App Service

Properties.AlarmDescription: CPU high usage alarm for the ASG
CPU low usage alarm for the ASG

dockerDevAccessKey.Description: IAM Access Key for ECR access

sesUserAccessKey.Description: IAM Access Key for SES access
